title: Project skins first strike
body:
if you gift someone a project skin during first strike, do they get the first strike border thing? 
Thx

replies.body: Ive been wondering this as well actually, its the kind of thing that might not work right and then you've screwed it up for that person, so it would be great to hear from riot about this, to put our minds at rest.
Yup! This has definitely got precedent, and gifting should also gift the border :)

The First Strike skins cost more, since gifting them(non-mysteriously) I would assume have the border. Im willing to bet that even a mystery gifted one would count as First Strike in the first week due to the possible coding on the skins during the first week.
